instructions.en: Exit the traffic circle towards Destination 1
instructions.fr: Sortir du rond-point en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Lakukan agak ke kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Fai una destra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.pl: Łagodnie w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Exit the traffic circle towards Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Saia da rotunda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Ieșiți din sensul giratoriu spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: Сверните с круговой развязки в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sv: Kör ut ur rondellen mot Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sağ yöne dön
